headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Convenience Store Robberies
content: Pixelated surveillance camera footage recently revealed a robber sticking up cashiers of local businesses from behind the wheel of a go-kart. To celebrate their ingenuity and criminal ambition, thieves who complete Convenience Store Robberies will walk away with double the usual GTA$ and RP. The go-kart part is optional, though encouraged.
